official_title: A resolution to congratulate Wayland Academy of Beaver Dam, Wisconsin, on 125 years of achievement and overall excellence in the field of education.

summary.text: Extends the congratulations of the House of Representatives to Wayland Academy of Beaver Dam, Wisconsin, on 125 years of achievement in the field of education.
